thread.title: Not 'dating' but Ronda Rousey and Travis Browne are together
thread.title_full: Not 'dating' but Ronda Rousey and Travis Browne are together - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Not 'dating' but Ronda Rousey and Travis Browne are together
text:
Theo Wargo/NBC/Getty Images for "The Tonight Sh Ronda Rousey confirms her relationship with UFC heavyweight Travis Brown on Monday. Ethan Miller/Getty Images 'She's my woman,' Travis Browne says of Ronda Rousey, who adds that 'dating is for children ... we're together.' Previous Next Enlarge It’s a match made in the octagon.
UFC superstar Ronda Rousey confirmed Monday that she is in a relationship with heavyweight Travis Browne.
"I don't talk about my personal life much. That's why it's called 'personal life,'" Rousey said in a statement issued to ESPN Monday . "It's true that Travis and I are in a relationship. I've really enjoyed the time we have spent together and getting to know one another. And that's all I'm going to say about it."
Browne summed up the relationship thusly:
"Dating is for children. Dating is for kids. Over the summer, through all the s--t that I had to shuffle through, that I had to sift through, Ronda and I started talking throughout the summer and I'll say now that we are together,” he told MMAFighting.com . She's my woman and I'm her man. There's no boyfriend, girlfriend stuff. There's no dating. We're together."
View Gallery Ronda Rousey's knockout moments
The “s--t” Browne was referring to were allegations of domestic violence levied by his estranged wife, whom Browne has two children with. The UFC conducted an internal investigation after Jenna Renee Webb released photos of her bruised body on Twitter and claimed they were caused by Browne. Criminal charges were never brought against Browne.
Rousey, 28, and Browne, 33, both train at the Glendale Fighting Club in Los Angeles.
